lines.text: Life is bitter for I am a sitter and put little kiddies to bed. While I tuck the sheet around their feet, they're busy slappin' my head. They throw their trains and rattle my brains; my head is full of dents. No wonder I'm sour; goes on by the hour! And each hour I earn fifty cents.

[on phone, as Spike spanks him]
Hello, Acme Baby Sitting Agency? It looks like your star sitter is going to have to do his sitting standing up.

[after the chick hatches from his egg]
Happy birthday kid!

second cousin? Well then you're a stranger and little kids should never have anything to do with strangers, I'll face the world alone, bad cats will want to eat me, autos will run over me, dogs will chase me, chicken hawks, tigers, lions!

[after he blows Daffy into a mud hole with a pig]
Aren't you going to chase me anymore or would you rather be a pig?
